ABOUT US

A reliable team of experts who offer handyman services

Regardless of the size of your home, maintaining it can be a struggle. While you may not have the time or the tools to accomplish everything on your to-do list, what you do have is a local Bauer X® with a reliable team of experts who offer handyman services with a Done Right Guarantee.
